endpoints.description: The batch IP lookup endpoint allows you to group up to 1024 IP search requests into a single request (you can mix up IPv4 and IPv6 addresses).
endpoints.name: Batch IP Lookup

endpoints.description: Look up the IP address the current API request is coming from.
endpoints.name: Origin IP Lookup

endpoints.description: This is the primary Ipregistry endpoint. It is used to look up any given IPv4 or IPv6 addresses.
endpoints.name: Single IP Lookup

info.description: Ipregistry is a trusted and in-depth IP Geolocation and Threat detections source of information that can benefit publishers, ad networks, retailers, financial services, e-commerce stores and more.
info.name: IpRegistry
